Messenger module¶

This is a simple messenger module for HWIOS, which offers one-to-all client messages and smiley support. It can easily be extended to send private messages as well, or to support irc-like channels.

Code References¶

init_messenger(client)[source]¶

When websocket client connects, it will get it’s online list from here

read_online(client)[source]¶

Return an online list to all connected clients after one connects/disconnects

Parameters:client (Client) – The requesting client
Returns:dict - Data response containing the userlist
send_message(client, message)[source]¶

Core business of the messenger. Sending messages to other clients

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • message (str) – Message that the client wants to send to other clients
Returns:

dict - Data response containing the message and the client who sent the message
send_private_message(client, to_client_uuid, message)[source]¶

Sends a message only to a specified client. Not in use currently

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • to_client_uuid (str) – The uuid of the client to which send the message
  • message (str) – Message that the client wants to send
update_online(client)[source]¶

Return an online list to all connected clients after one connects/disconnects, and also return the context to the disconnecting/connecting user

Parameters:client (Client) – The requesting client
Returns:dict - Data response containing the userlist
